metadata.title: CVE-2013-1424 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
[matplotlib buffer overrun]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1424` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-matplotlib - 1.5.1-1ubuntu1
python-matplotlib-data - 1.5.1-1ubuntu1
python3-matplotlib - 1.5.1-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: matplotlib package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.1-1ubuntu1').
